page.title: 15Recreation areas in Fearn.
page.content: In our area we have two swingparks and a football pitch.One of the swingparks is made of wood.It has a swing with a tyre on it.There is a net that you can climb,a see-saw and a pole that you can climb. The other park we have is beside the football pitch.It has two swings for older children and two swings for infants.There is a climbing frame that is supposed to be a like a fire engine.There is a little slide but that doesn't work very well.Also there is a roundabout,but yiu have to push very hard to get it going.An obstacle course is alongside the pitch.The football pitch is used for all sorts of things e.g.our school sports and by the local football team.
